alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 4:14AM EST until December 19 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 10 AM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 7 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 to 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Ohio. * WHEN...From 1 PM this afternoon to 10 AM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility overnight. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will intensify during the evening commute today and be heavy at times through late tonight. Snow will diminish from west to east on Tuesday morning. The higher snow amounts are expected inland from Lake Erie. Temperatures will fall into the 20s overnight with wind chills in the teens.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Ashtabula Lakeshore; Cuyahoga; Lake; Medina; Portage; Summit; Trumbull
